title: Sounds lowers every time something else makes noise
body: Basically title. If I start youtube, skype, spotify or anything that makes noise, my League audio lowers. Is this a computer setting or game setting?

replies.body: Some programs like Skype might change volume of other apps you have running in order to hear it better.  You may be able to fix this up through your OS sound settings.  Right click the sound icon, select communications, and select the button for Do Nothing.  Hopefully, this will help fix your sound!

I'll be honest, it worked yesterday on my EUW account. But now that I switched to my account on NA the problem came back. Checked my sound settings on the OS but it was still 'Do nothing' so I have no idea.
